mcq.statement: Who fought against the Maratha Empire in the Third Battle of Panipat in 1761?
mcq.one_liner: In the Third Battle of Panipat in 1761, the Maratha Empire fought against the forces of **Ahmad Shah Abdali**, the King of Afghanistan.

suggestions.topic: Decline: Ahmad Sirhindi, Shah Waliullah, Maratha Empire 1674-1818
